name: activecampaign-add-contact-to-automation
description: Adds an existing contact to an existing automation. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/create-new-contactautomation).

contactId.description: Contact ID of the Contact, to be linked to the contactAutomation

automationId.description: Automation ID of the automation, to be linked to the contactAutomation.

name: activecampaign-create-account
description: Create a new account. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference#create-an-account-new).

name: activecampaign-create-deal
description: Creates a new deal. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/create-a-deal-new).

value.description: Deal's value in cents. (i.e. $456.78 => 45678). Must be greater than or equal to zero.

currency.description: Deal's currency in 3-digit ISO format, lowercased.

group.description: Deal's pipeline id. Required if `deal.stage` is not provided. If `deal.group` is not provided, the stage's pipeline will be assigned to the deal automatically.

stage.description: Deal's stage id. Required if `deal.group` is not provided. If `deal.stage` is not provided, the deal will be assigned with the first stage in the pipeline provided in `deal.group`.

owner.description: Deal's owner id. Required if pipeline's auto-assign option is disabled.

name: activecampaign-create-note
description: Adds a note, arbitrary information to a contact, deal, or other Active Campaign objects. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/create-a-note).

reltype.description: The related type where the note will be added to. Possible Values: `Activity`, `Deal`, `DealTask`, `Subscriber`, `CustomerAccount`

relid.description: Id of the related object where the note is being added.

name: activecampaign-create-tracked-event
description: Tracks an event using event tracking. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/track-event).

key.description: This value is unique to your ActiveCampaign account and can be found named "Event Key" on Settings > Tracking > Event Tracking inside your ActiveCampaign account.

event.description: The name of the event you wish to track.

eventdata.description: A value you wish to store for the event.

actid.description: This value is unique to your ActiveCampaign account and can be found named "actid" on Settings > Tracking > Event Tracking API.

visitEmail.description: Email address of the contact you wish to track this event for.

name: activecampaign-find-contact
description: Finds a contact. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/list-all-contacts).

search.description: Filter contacts that match the given value in the contact names, organization, phone or email

name: activecampaign-find-deal
description: Finds an existing deal by search field. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/list-all-deals)

search.description: Search text to use with **Search Field** parameter.

name: activecampaign-get-all-lists
description: Retrieves all lists. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/retrieve-all-lists)

name.description: Filter by the name of the list

limit.description: Limit the number of returned results

name: activecampaign-get-contact
description: Retrieves an existing contact. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/get-contact).

contactId.description: ID of the contact to retrieve.

name: activecampaign-get-contact-by-email
description: Retrieves contact data from the ActiveCampaign CRM by email address. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/list-all-contacts).

email.description: Email address of the contact you want to get.

name: activecampaign-get-deal
description: Retrieves an existing deal. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/retrieve-a-deal)

dealId.description: ID of the deal to retrieve.

contactId.description: ID of the contact to retrieve.

name: activecampaign-list-all-contacts
description: Retrieve all existing contacts. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/list-all-contacts).

ids.description: Filter contacts by ID. Can be repeated for multiple IDs. Example: ids[]=1&ids[]=2&ids[]=42

email.description: Email address of the contact you want to get

emailLike.description: Filter contacts that contain the given value in the email address

exclude.description: Exclude from the response the contact with the given ID

formid.description: Filter contacts associated with the given form

idGreater.description: Only include contacts with an ID greater than the given ID

idLess.description: Only include contacts with an ID less than the given ID

listid.description: Filter contacts associated with the given list

organization.description: (Deprecated) Please use Account-Contact end points. Filter contacts associated with the given organization ID

search.description: Filter contacts that match the given value in the contact names, organization, phone or email

segmentid.description: Return only contacts that match a list segment (this param initially returns segment information, when it is run a second time it will return contacts that match the segment)

seriesid.description: Filter contacts associated with the given automation

tagid.description: Filter contacts associated with the given tag

createdBefore.description: Filter contacts that were created prior to this date

createdAfter.description: Filter contacts that were created after this date

updatedBefore.description: Filter contacts that were updated before this date

updatedAfter.description: Filter contacts that were updated after this date

waitid.description: Filter by contacts in the wait queue of an automation block

inGroupLists.description: Set this to `true` in order to return only contacts that the current user has permissions to see.

name: activecampaign-remove-tag-from-contact
description: Removes a tag from a contact. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/remove-a-contacts-tag)

name: activecampaign-tag-contact
description: Tags a contact. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/create-contact-tag).

name: activecampaign-update-deal
description: Updates an existing deal. See the docs [here](https://developers.activecampaign.com/reference/update-a-deal-new).

dealId.description: Id of the deal to update.

value.description: Deal's value in cents. (i.e. $456.78 => 45678). Must be greater than or equal to zero. int32 datatype.

currency.description: Deal's currency in 3-digit ISO format, lowercased.

group.description: Deal's pipeline id. Deal's stage or `deal.stage` should belong to `deal.group`.

stage.description: Deal's stage id. `deal.stage` should belong to Deal's pipeline or `deal.group`.
